tasks.name: Identify the core problem
tasks.goal: Identify and define the core problem for the Lean Canvas
tasks.description: Analyze data to identify the primary problem that needs to be addressed.
tasks.expected_output: A clear problem statement defining the core problem.

tasks.name: Verify the problem
tasks.goal: Verify the identified problem for accuracy and relevance
tasks.description: Review and verify the accuracy and relevance of the identified problem.
tasks.expected_output: Validation report confirming the problem's accuracy and relevance.

tasks.name: Design the solutions
tasks.goal: Design and summarize possible solutions for the identified problems
tasks.description: Develop potential solutions to the identified problem and analyze their feasibility.
tasks.expected_output: A summary of potential solutions and their feasibility analysis.

tasks.name: Validate the solutions
tasks.goal: Validate the designed solutions for feasibility and effectiveness
tasks.description: Review and validate the feasibility and effectiveness of the designed solutions.
tasks.expected_output: Validation report confirming the solutions' feasibility and effectiveness.
